conbody.p: By “painting” a section on the chart, one can easily zoom in on that timeframe. Both the chart and the grid will be updated with the new timeframe. To paint a section of the chart, click and drag the pointer across the section of the chart you want to select. For example, selecting the chart from 2016Feb to the 2016May(shown by the double arrow), results in the new new chart display as shown in figure below.

fig.title: Zooming into Report Timeframe
fig.note: The selected region is also greyed out.

fig.title: Zooming into Report Timeframe
fig.note: The new filter is added at the bottom of the chart (circled in red).
